--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Spinister's fading eyes flickered as he saw Needlenose engulf his 
body,
> crushing him up against a wall. Singe looked around, as Spasma leapt 
of
> the chair, "Were gonna crash, we'll die!" he screamed out nervously.
> Hook crawled to the chair, and swatted Spasma out of the way, to sit
> down, and help Scrapper set down, he didnt want to die.

::Long Haul::

    Long Haul was a mess. He was terrified and the only way he could 
express his fear was to lay at the back wall, hanging onto the nearest 
projection so hard his grip left dents. His jaws chattered, sounding 
much like the ratt-atat-tat of a talegraph machine. He was oblivious 
to all but the pilot and silently prayed (if you could call it that) 
to himself. 
    He did not want to die. Not yet. Not without a good battle.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
***************************
